entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 7 April 2023
